content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at unknown position

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab
Consists of a lab at unknown position

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the entities are correctly connected before attempting to connect pipes.
- Make sure that the pipe connections are not nil.
- Verify that the fluid systems are correctly set up.
### Errors when inserting coal into drill
- Make sure the drill is not out of fuel before inserting coal.
- Verify that the coal is being inserted into the correct drill.
### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure that the burner inserter has fuel before using it.
- Make sure that the burner inserter is correctly connected to the chest and small electric pole.
